column5: I like your sig..................  Catch your limit.... but limit your catch Have not heard or seen that saying in sometime.  Many can learn from this. TY  Brian  Didnt mean to center you out.LOL

That's OK Brian and I'm glad that you like it  Took that line from an old fishing show and it always stayed in my mind..... I can't remember the name of the show     but use to watch it every Saturday morning  It goes well with those that practise C&R plus keep the odd one for the pan  Jacques aka Leechman
LOL Jacques  Yes I remember that being said aswell on an old show. It just slips my memory.
Oh yeah, big words coming from a hunter eh!  Fish are made out of meat too yanno!!!         ... just messin' with ya Brian!
I think I remember now but not a 100% sure.... it was "Rod & Reel Streamside" with Bill Saiff that I got this saying from
Sure glad I scrolled down there Dawg. HAHAHAHAHA      I think your right Jacques.
I remember hearing that on a specific fishing show as well..
